carrier_permission
InfluxDB log InfluxDB instance URL / IP InfluxDB URL / IP (with protocol and port) InfluxDB Organization Set InfluxDB Organization Influx Token Set InfluxDB Token Log network information Log neighbour cells Log throughput information Log cell information Log signal information Log IP addresses Log battery information InfluxDB bucket Set InfluxDB bucket Measurement name Tags Comma separated list of tags Enable InfluxDB log Enable notification update This will wake up the screen on each update running_indicator Start / stop the logging service Log to a local Influx 2.x database Log to a remote Influx 2.x database Work Profile Start on boot Start the logging service on device boot Use fake location Use a fake location for all measurements for testing / privacy reasons
This sample demonstrates how to create a managed profile. You can also learn how to enable or disable other apps and how to set restrictions to them. Intents can be configured to be forwarded between primary account and managed profile. Finally, you can wipe all the data associated with the profile. Note that there can only be one managed profile on a device.
Set up profile Enable forwarding of Share Intent Send a sample share Intent Disable forwarding This app is currently not the owner of this device or profile. Please tap Next to set up appropriate management by this app. The app is ready to control the managed profile. Remove managed profile Setup all done To manage the configuration in your managed profile, visit the badged version of this application. Calculator in this profile: Chrome in this profile: Set Chrome restrictions Clear Chrome restrictions Icon Sample Managed Profile Enabled Disabled Restrictions set. No app can handle this intent. Cleared. Set up managed profile Preferential Network Service -P / Parallel streams Settings InfluxDB Special Codes Interval Log signal data Log to a local file Log file upload Subscriptions Ping run continuously Location is disabled, enable it or use fake location Enable Location Use fake location Location Disabled Radio Settings Set PLMN Select Access Network Type Persist until reboot Carrier Settings Apply carrier settings Current Carrier Settings of the main subcription Ping -w 5 8.8.8.8 Read Carrier Settings Press the read button Exit
